This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0749 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
0 Valid code; not used for groupingValid code; not used for grouping
1 Valid code; used for groupingValid code; used for grouping
2 Invalid code; not used for groupingInvalid code; not used for grouping
3 Invalid code; code is relevant for groupingInvalid code; code is relevant for grouping

name: DrgGroupingStatus
title: drgGroupingStatus
description: Code system of concepts specifying the status of the use of the gender information for diagnosis related group (DRG) determination.  US Realm. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DRG segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0749 (DRG Grouping Status)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain
